lenders.occupation: Retired Biology Professor / Higher Ed Data Analyst

lenders.occupational_info: Grandma taught biology for many years, mainly to nursing students. I work for a large university and help them gather and manage information about their employees.

lenders.name: Erika
lenders.loan_because:
I am a student, so I know how important it can sometimes be to borrow money to improve your future!

I love that Kiva is based on the knowledge of local financial experts and entrepreneurs about their economy, rather than asking local people to rely on foreign "experts" to tell them how to fix things.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a university student from Canada studying in the USA for my doctorate in archaeology.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: True happiness must be shared

lenders.loan_because: There is a need.

lenders.name: Stacey

lenders.name: Levi and Kelli
lenders.loan_because: We can't think of a better way to help people than to give them the opportunity to create and sustain their own business or livelihood.

lenders.occupational_info: I provide services to students with disabilities so that they can achieve their college education.

lenders.name: Paolo Massa
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I spend time, often in front of a computer, thinking about how to make a reasonable, maybe useful, use of technology.

lenders.name: Bill, KF6 Uganda
lenders.loan_because: I believe that market-based solutions hold the greatest potential for solving our most critical social problems. I'm honored to assist deserving individuals who are working hard to move out of poverty and restore the hope that with hard work, persistence and access to necessary resources, tomorrow holds greater promise than today. With Kiva, lending is easy, fun and interesting!  And best of all my contribution is used time and again with multiple borrowers across the globe - truly a multiplier effect.
lenders.occupational_info: How energy is sourced, refined, distributed and used is one of the critical issues of our time. Energy connects all aspects of human and non-human life. As a life long environmentalist with an MBA, helping our country move from environmentally-degrading sources of energy to clean, sustainable sources allows me to align my profession with my values. I develop large projects in both the public and private sectors.

lenders.name: Billy & Angela
lenders.loan_because:
1. We are able to.
2. We had the opportunity to see first hand how much these loans can help while serving in the Peace Corps.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because:
Everyone deserves the chance to be self sufficient and I believe that small business entrepreneurs are the wave of the future.  

It is an HONOR to be able to be given the opportunity to support these entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: stacia
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who are trying to better their situation.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: Jeanna
lenders.loan_because: Because ,I believe that we are the body of Christ ,and as the body.Our arms should be reaching,our hands should be healing,Our feet should be going.His Love should be showing.We are many members but one body.Jesus is the way the truth and the life.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am just like you.I could be your  daughter,your sister,your mother.
Your friend.Your sister in Christ.I am just like you.Some of things that make you laugh,Make me laugh to.When I hurt I cry.I feel joy just like you.I am just like you.My job is to make your day just a little bit more joyful,as you have made mine,in the act of giving.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people who are trying hard to make their lives better should have a reliable opportunity to be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach history to 13, 14, and 15-year-old students.

lenders.occupational_info: Try again and again.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Kiva allows the free flow of "support" from one source to another, without having to play the bureaucratic banking game.  I am truly grateful for the opportunity to give to someone else who has a desire to challenge their life, and do something someone else might tell them is not possible.

lenders.name: Kari
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a helping had as they reach for their dreams
lenders.occupational_info: I talk to college students and help them prepare to prepare for getting jobs in public service after they graduate

lenders.name: Wu Rui-Liang
lenders.loan_because:
I would prefer that the current monetary system is changed to, ala for example, LETS

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Local_Exchange_Trading_Systems

or Swiss WIR system

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WIR_Bank

or other alternatives described in one of the books of Bernard Litaer:

http://www.transaction.net/money/book/

so there is a balance between production and consumption by every individual and every country, and money is used solely as an exchange medium in economy and not as a way for accumulating wealth or practicing greediness. Before that happens micro credit is the closest thing to that goal.

I also do this as a tribute to my mother (the one on the photo) who passed away in 2007. She always liked to help people who in needs. I hope she would be happy that I do the same like she did.

lenders.name: Nichole
lenders.loan_because: I am thankful for what I have, and want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help large organizations address their software needs.

lenders.name: Marek
lenders.loan_because: I want to help
lenders.occupational_info: I study engineering and work part-time as a web developer

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I install and maintain computer networks for small business in Tucson, Arizona, USA.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: "It is more blessed to give than to receive."
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes.

lenders.name: Liza
lenders.loan_because: Microlending provides empowerment--isn't that something we all need? I also want to feel like I am helping better this world.

lenders.loan_because: This is the perfect way to help people building up there own life and future. With just that little help from our side we just hope  we can make the world a little better.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: Other people need my money more than I do.  This is an easy way to perform 'economic stimulus' for someone else's economy that really needs it.  My family believes that practicing social justice is the best way to follow Jesus' teachings and put our faith into practice.

lenders.name: Carlo and Diane

Just think for a moment how easily we spend $25 for something frivolous. Many hands(or wallets) make light work.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I really believe that there are a lot of small entrepreneurs that could do great if they were given a small chance. But because of their current life situation, they are kept in poverty. So I am so pleased that Kiva gives a mean to help these people.

lenders.loan_because: I like to help people that need a helping hand . I think that Kiva has given me a fun way to give to people I don't know.

lenders.name: John & Phyllis

lenders.name: The Fisher Family
lenders.loan_because: Our family has been blessed beyond measure.   Having traveled to Guatemala and Russia - we have developed such a heart for missions and by partnering with Kiva - it allows us to feel like we are serving on the mission field everyday.

lenders.loan_because: My mom used to own a store when I was a kid, and it was difficult for her at times, so I wanted to help someone with her store.

lenders.occupational_info: I am working on quite a few projects, but photography is my passion and I spend a great deal of time on it. I admire works of Dorothea Lange, a photographer famous for her work during the Great Depression, Mother Teresa and Médecins Sans Frontières.  I am still learning the art of photography and hope one day I will be good  enough to be able to share more of the revenues generated from my photo sales with these entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Alexis
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those in need around the world, one small step at a time.  It is a wonderful thing to see my contribution being transformed into a productive, life-changing event for someone in another country.

lenders.loan_because: I was viewing a show a P.B.S called Frontline/World. The show was about the Kiva foundation I thought it was a wonderful idea. I loan because I want to change lives and whom ever life I do change thank you for changing my life as well. I BELIEVE
lenders.occupational_info: Work a friend of mine who owns transportation and Valet Company. We valet at a popular restraunt in Houston called Brennans. Aimee

lenders.loan_because: I believe in the golden rule: "treat others as you would like to be treated."

lenders.name: Lucy
lenders.loan_because: It's can make world  different !!Many people  just  enjoy  shopping .make money ... but   soul always  feel empty  because  they  are very  selfish  never understand  help  people to change  thier  life  is  so wonderful thing .

lenders.name: Angel
lenders.loan_because: I received a Kiva Gift Certificate for my birthday and I am so moved and humbled. Giving is the best gift.
lenders.occupational_info: Boring at best!

lenders.name: Greta Galeazzi
lenders.loan_because:
we MUST help people born in the "wrong" side of the world. 
It's easy and funny the living for us..good schools, brand new clothes each month, big cars, exotic holidays, discos, credit cards... 
mum and dad pays all..that's easy living! 
But don't forget the others! 

Those people are poor..but i'm sure "inside" they are richer than us. 
It's time to SHARE our money with them. 
It's time to stop wasting money in stupid things. 
Let's help them! They don't need all our stupid things..They only need some $$ to SURVIVE.
Galeazzi Greta
lenders.occupational_info:
europeAN CITIZEN
Greta Galeazzi

lenders.name: maria
lenders.loan_because: Por causa deles.. Dos da fotografia e dos outros.

lenders.name: Graça
lenders.loan_because: For 18 years I worked owner of an agency for tourism. With the lack of government investment in small businesses, I was forced to close it. Moved me to a city that is considered the new center of tourism in the south of Brazil. It is a city designed in the form of Rio de Janeiro. Here I have the intention of opening a hostel for receiving tourists from around the world coming to the city. Currently rent only 3 rooms in my own house, but I have the dream of opening a real Hostel.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to receive tourists from around the world coming to Santa Catarina. Not a hotel, but a home of the family that hosts people. The city where live receives every year in the summer about 2 million people and during the entire year receive tourists. In addition to tourists, the city is next to Itajaí, a city with a large port and so they also receive a large number of visitors who are hosting in hostels for value more accessible and a more familiar. During the hosting of the tourists do breakfast, lunch and dinner, wash their clothes, and we look at the airport and make of car trips by beaches. With an inn could increase the number of guests, increase the number of employees, buying a caminhoneta for transport to airports and outings.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed my family and myself in countless ways. By loaning what I can I hope to help spread God's word and blessing throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Army Civil Affairs Soldier. I am on my second deployment to Iraq and helped, in a small way, to improve the lives of all Iraqis.

lenders.name: Jammys Clay
lenders.loan_because: Eu quero poder ter a minha escola de informatica, modesta, fazer os meus consertos, mas nao tenho condições, pra iniciar um negócio próprio...
lenders.occupational_info: Eu sou técnico em informatica, desenvolvimento de sistemas, manutenção de micros e periféricos, ministro aulas nessa área...

lenders.name: dina
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit makes a difference

lenders.name: Daniel & Sabine
lenders.loan_because: We lend, because Jesus teaches  to help others.   God promised to bless those who give back what they've been given.  Plus, If the people we help, help others in turn,  it will just keep going on forever.  Seems like a pretty good plan.

lenders.name: scootermonkey
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people better themselves and their lives, and the people on Kiva seem to have the self-motivation to become fully independent.  I admire this trait and feel motivated myself to help them in their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: i develop software for clients. i also love to blog about how dating and work have a lot more in common than you'd think.

lenders.name: Brian and Heather
lenders.loan_because: We have been unable to shake the monetary system
lenders.occupational_info: we learn

lenders.name: The Crossing
lenders.loan_because: We decided to go together as a group & help someone.
lenders.occupational_info: We get together each Wednesday night and eat dinner, then spend time sharing what we've learned in our personal study & discussing topics from the Bible.

lenders.name: Mother of two...
lenders.loan_because: As a former single mom, I have had much struggle in my life...and nearly lost my two precious children (see photo).  I want to help others make a better life for their families.

lenders.name: tim
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people to lift themselves out of there current situations. these gifts just keep on giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I am promoting this site to help more  people help in this way

lenders.name: jorit
lenders.loan_because: the least we can do is give people in other countries the chance to improve their lives and providing funds like this makes people active rather than passive
lenders.occupational_info: I travel around the world to maintain a distributor network who sell our products (software for behavioral research). THus I see a lot of poverty right next door to riches

lenders.name: Lucy
lenders.loan_because:
it is a small world and we all need to pay it forward to some degree and try to help each other.
We are all God's children.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from the US Post Office after 24 years, I was a Postmaster  in a small rural post office.  The population is about 2000 people.  We have cold snowy winters and beautiful country summers.

lenders.name: Terris grandchildren
lenders.loan_because: everyone that can help, should help
lenders.occupational_info:
11 grandchildren (ages 2-13) learning how to give back.
We give all the glory to God

lenders.name: LUXSTONE
lenders.loan_because: At LUXSTONE we believe in the power of dreams.  There is no dream too big nor too small.  As men and women, It is our destiny  to realize our dreams regardless of life circumstance.

lenders.name: Alastair
lenders.loan_because: For alleviation of poverty, for love, and for creating new ties around the world to unite us as one.

lenders.name: anette
lenders.loan_because:
it is so important to give back 
im so truly blessed with abundance
lenders.occupational_info: I am with the laborers union and i am a very important part of building the light rail transportation

lenders.occupational_info: trabalho com compra e venda de material ferroso e não ferroso, chapas, bobinas, retalhos e sucatas de carbono, inox, aluminio e cobre, trabalho como vendedor nessa area a 5 anos, mas agora quero ganhar dinheiro pela minha empresa, chega de trabalhar para os outros!!!!!!!!

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I wish something like this had been around when I needed it.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying to be a social worker... linking services to people in need.  I think this is a great idea.

lenders.name: Turk
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm the founder of The Nobelity Project which works with Nobel laureates and others on solutions to global problems. My feature doc One Peace at a Time has a nice segment on meeting one of my Kiva borrowers in Nairobi.

lenders.name: romil
lenders.loan_because: I really wanted to finish my studies, or have a small business to pay for my school tuition fees.
lenders.occupational_info: A buy and sell of agricultural and aquatic products is good. 100 percent of our people eat staple foods. Everyday, people in the markets look for fresh and lower priced items. Busy people find themselves waiting foods to be delivered in their doorsteps, specially in manila urbanized area. In my recent career turnaround, I am currently finishing my CNA and caregiving courses to qualify for jobs abroad, like Canada or UK. and if Gods allowed, I`d like to get my Med. Transcription the next semester.

lenders.name: Kendrah Pearson
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Clementine
lenders.loan_because: it is a better use of my money than spending it at the mall and I hope these loans allow people to improve their lives by accomplishing their short/ long-term goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist university students, faculty, and staff with their international programs, as well as the new international students with adjusting to their life in the US.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: There was time in my life when it was hard to make ends meet. And own a home. I was told no because of my income so, I learned the business to help others afford homes with low income or no down payment.
lenders.occupational_info: I truly care and want others to have a home they can call there own- and help with finding home loans that help first time buyers and low income.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: I am a human being.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: it's an important thing to do

lenders.name: Marty
lenders.occupational_info: I have owned businesses and know how tough operating a business can be. So I am grateful that I can help just a little...

lenders.name: Karen

lenders.name: Tonia
lenders.loan_because: I can.

We need to cultivate a universal responsibility for one another and the planet we share.  - The Dalai Lama

lenders.name: Samia
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the teaching someone to fish philosophy.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying business.

lenders.name: Ellen, Steve and Zoie

lenders.name: Cláudia
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help those who work hard and have a very difficult lives. My reward is a warm feeling in my heart for making a difference, even if it's small.

lenders.name: Marketplacerepricing.com
lenders.loan_because: Here at Marketplacerepricing we love to help people, help themselves in business. Kiva is a great organization that we at Marketplacerepricing are happy to support!
lenders.occupational_info: We help our clients increase sales and maximise profits by leveraging high-quality online competitive data. Some of the world’s biggest retailers are using our services.

lenders.name: Misha
lenders.loan_because: Microlending works.

lenders.loan_because: It's up to all of us to make the world a better place.  People need a chance to make their lives better.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is the Future!

lenders.name: Tawn
lenders.loan_because: God has bestowed so many blessings on me and my family that I would like to be a blessing to others.

lenders.name: Zoe and Tom
lenders.loan_because: We believe in the power of regular people to change the world. If our loan can make a difference to someone and help their lives, we hope one day they will also aid someone in this manner. We hope programs like this will make the world a better place for all of our children.
lenders.occupational_info: We study the brain to try and see what happens when people experience very stressful life events and to try and understand why people abuse drugs and alcohol. Hopefully our research will result in medicines that will help people with post-traumatic stress disorder and substance abuse.

lenders.name: Alice
lenders.loan_because: I believe in Kiva & I care. Yes I care about YOU!
lenders.occupational_info: A bookkeeper keeps track of the money that comes in and goes out of the company in much the same way that you do. The difference is I do it for a lot of properties that we rent to small businesses. We pay many vendors who do work at the properties or provide services.

lenders.name: Cameron D
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of the market to reduce poverty.

lenders.name: Cackles
lenders.loan_because: We are a group of fortunate women friends who want to help other women friends.
lenders.occupational_info: We are all ,in some fashion ,related to the hospitallity industry.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Elton

lenders.occupational_info: I represent people in court who are accused of breaking the law.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: I think that we can ALL make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: Iam a primary teacher...on maternity leave with my first child, Owen.

lenders.loan_because: Microlending is probably the most effective program for aiding the Third World.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a mortage broker for 30 Years.

lenders.name: Merrill
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people around the world that would not normally be able to obtain a loan through the normal channels.

lenders.name: Joe & Eileen
lenders.loan_because: What a great way to help people to help themselves.

lenders.name: CU/UWM Econ class
lenders.loan_because: We want to be involved in direct financing of an entrepreneur who needs our funds.
lenders.occupational_info:
The original funds were donated by a Money and Banking economics class at the University of Wisconsin - Milwaukee.  Students in a Money and Banking class at the University of Colorado have added to that amount.  As we study financial markets, Kiva provides a perfect opportunity to explore the role of risk and return.

(please note that our participation should not be taken as an endorsement by the University of Wisconsin - Milwaukee or the University of Colorado).

lenders.name: Tiffany
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel as if I'm making a difference, to someone, some way.

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.occupation: Independent Associate with Pre-Paid Legal Services
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a great idea. You are not giving a handout, but a hand up! I believe in helping those who are willing to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Independent Associate with a company called Pre-Paid Legal Services inc. Pre-Paid Legal is revolutionizing the legal system! One family at a time. And we also help people make a living while making a difference!!

lenders.name: Rachael
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important, and I like it because it's not charity. It is a loan from one human being to another, much like I'd loan to a friend.
lenders.occupational_info: Well, I'm a student now. Hopefully someday I will be a landscape ecologist. This study looks at earth processes and can analyze them at a different scale, to better understand things that are too big for a person to see.

lenders.name: Bertil
lenders.loan_because: i love it !

lenders.name: Sabari
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back.

lenders.name: Barb
lenders.loan_because: God has Blessed me and my family, and it just feels good to help someone less fortunate than ourselves.

lenders.name: Deanna
lenders.loan_because: I find satisfaction in helping people, not just in my own local, but throughout the world.

lenders.name: Kindree
lenders.loan_because: I like making a tangible, positive difference in someone else's life and I especially like assisting entrepreneurs in bettering their own lives and the lives of their children and their communities. I value and admire the creativity and fortitude that these people are demonstrating by starting and growing their own businesses. I have had a few small businesses of my own, and it is not easy!
lenders.occupational_info: I write instructions that help people use our company website. I also work closely with our team to create a better website and improve the experience for the people who visit the website.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: Giving people the tools to make their lives better is something so significant and easy to identify with that I am happy to be a part of this program. I have been helped in so many ways throughout my life. It is essential for me to help others as a manner of sharing.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired but my role as a  social worker was as a local government worker. I had many different programs that I worked in during my career. A common theme emerged that was to work with individuals and families towards their becoming self sufficient. This took the form of training, employment, education assistance, as well as a place to live. Social work became my niche. In retirement I try to keep myself involved as a volunteer in helping people.

lenders.name: Luciana
lenders.loan_because: Small acts can cause big effects in our society
lenders.occupational_info:
Selling dreams...
Trips are experiences that you keep in your mind and heart more than any souvenir you can buy.
I have deep pleasure to show the city through my eyes...

lenders.name: Jini

lenders.occupational_info: I work at the R20 organization (Regions Of Climate Action), with the responsibility of building relationships with local Mayors/Governors, local NGOs and Managers/Directors in the private renewable energy sector. The objective is to provide technical studies and implement bankable projects with renewable energy, via the most efficient R20 development programs. This includes consulting services and project management.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I can see where my money is going and all I forego is interest on my loan. This money will come back and I'm able to sent back out to work again, and again, and again.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a full-time finance student who loves to volunteer.

lenders.name: Marc

lenders.occupational_info: I am a veterinarian for exotic animals.

lenders.name: Mac
lenders.loan_because: I like seeing people succeed, and sometimes progress requires a little bit of leverage!

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.occupation: massage and energy therapies and artist
lenders.loan_because: We are one heart with one rhythm on this blessed planet. Assisting someone raise up thus raises everyone up...

We are spiritual beings having a human experience. Humanity is currently awakening to it's true potential, to it's vastness as a multi-dimensional conscious being of love and light!

lenders.loan_because: you can change the world one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: We teach elementary school.

lenders.name: terry

lenders.name: Monodb

lenders.occupational_info: renewable power science and technology

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: everyone should have the opportunity to follow their dream and makes things happen.  I give entrepreneurs so much credit for having the courage and motivation to follow through with their goals.

lenders.name: zoe
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people in any way that I can. If I do that it might not change the world, but it will help that person.

lenders.name: Nancy Graham
lenders.loan_because: as human beings, we need each other. When we work together -- and contribute what we can -- we touch the world for good.

lenders.loan_because: $50 means a lot more in these people's lives than in mine

lenders.name: Anthea

lenders.occupational_info: I work as a district nurse, going to peoples homes to provide nursing care.

lenders.occupational_info: varied ... computer work, teaching, gardening .. anything that makes me happy .. :-)

lenders.occupational_info: I treat peoples gum disease by cleaning and polishing their teeth, and educating them so they dont loose their teeth in the future.

lenders.name: Heather

lenders.name: Liz

I raise goats and chickens in addition to growing a vey large garden because I want to know where my food comes from and I love sharing knowledge with others about self-sufficiency.m

lenders.name: Melina & Simon

lenders.occupational_info:
Teaching my children, the next generation how they can make a difference, how one person can make a difference!

Thanks Oprah!!!
